Polish embassy officials help co-op farm in farming
articles.content:
Polish embassy officials help co-op farm in farming
    Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Charge d'affaires ad interim of the Polish embassy in Korea Mieczyslaw Dedo and embassy officials helped the Korea-Poland Friendship Jangsuwon Cooperative Farm here in its farming on Tuesday.
   The guests weeded vegetable fields together with farmers.
   At a break, they sang and talked with each other.

articles.title: Military attaches corps visits different places
Kimilsungia  and Kimjongilia exhibition to be built
articles.content:
Kimilsungia  and Kimjongilia exhibition to be built 
    Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia  and Kimjongilia exhibition will be built in the Munsu area of Pyongyang on the bank of the River Taedong. 
   The unique-style exhibition with a total floor space of 5,000 square meters and a glass roof and walls  will have Kimilsungia  and Kimjongilia show hall, a video-recorded lecture room, greenhouse and tissue culture room and all other conditions needed for flower show and cultivation.   
   A ground-breaking ceremony took place on Tuesday.
   Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee  of the Worker's Party of Korea, and others.
